item.title: [bro] Gnawing Vermin

When Gnawing Vermin enters the battlefield, target player mills two cards.

When Gnawing Vermin dies, target creature you don't control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.description:

Creatures you control with mana value 3 or less get +1/+0.

item.title: [bro] Myrel, Shield of Argive
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.

Whenever Myrel, Shield of Argive attacks, create X 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature tokens, where X is the number of Soldiers you control.

item.title: [bro] Loran, Disciple of History
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

Whenever Loran, Disciple of History or another legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, return target artifact from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [bro] Thopter Architect
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

item.title: [bro] Fallaji Archaeologist
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

When Fallaji Archaeologist enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a noncreature, nonland card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Fallaji Archaeologist. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

item.title: [bro] Forging the Anchor
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of artifact cards from among htem and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [bro] Mightstone's Animation
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant artifact

When Mightstone's Animation enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 4/4 in addition to its other types.

Deathtouch

item.title: [bro] Ashnod's Intervention
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies or is put into an exile from the battlefield, return it to its owner's hand."

item.title: [bro] Diabolic Intent
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [bro] Disciples of Gix
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Human

When Disciples of Gix enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three artifact cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle.

item.title: [bro] Gix's Caress
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Gix's Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Put two +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.

• Destroy each creature with power 2 or less.

• Return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

• Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the highest power among creatures they control.

item.title: [bro] No One Left Behind
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless they discard a card.

item.title: [bro] Powerstone Fracture
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

Whenever one or more artifact and/or creature cards leave your graveyard during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

item.title: [bro] Mishra's Domination
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

As long as you control enchanted creature, it gets +2/+2. Otherwise, it can't block.

item.title: [bro] Obliterating Bolt
item.description:
Sorcery

Obliterating Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswlker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [bro] Pyrrhic Blast
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Pyrrhic Blast deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target. Draw a card.

item.title: [bro] Raze to the Ground
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell can't be countered.

Destroy target artifact. If its mana value was 1 or less, draw a card.

item.title: [bro] Sibling Rivalry
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Visions of Phyrexia
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't play a card from exile this turn, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Mishra's Research Desk
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Research Desk: Exile the top two cards of your library. Choose one of them. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [bro] Fallaji Excavation
item.description:
Sorcery

Create three tapped Powerstone tokens. You gain 3 life. (The tokens are artifacts with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Epic Confrontation
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

item.title: [bro] Fog of War
item.description:
Instant

You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 3 or less.

item.title: [bro] Gaea's Gift
item.description:
Instant

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains reach, trample, hexproof, and indestructible until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

item.title: [bro] Obstinate Baloth
item.description:
Creature — Beast

When Obstinate Baloth enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Obstinate Baloth, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.
